name: Magic Stone of Vaporization
text:
If your J/ruler isn't "Sol, Hierphant of the Helio Star" or "Sol, Dark Commander of Steam", this card enters your field rested unless you pay 300 life.
Treat this card as a fire magic stone and a water magic stone.
T: Produce R or U.
1, {dull}: Put a mana counter on your J/ruler.
